---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## concurrentPool() function

与えられた並行タスク数に基づいて、並行性のレベルの一貫性を保証します。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function concurrentPool<A>(
  length: number,
  iterable: AsyncIterable<A>,
): AsyncIterableIterator<A>;
```

## Example

```ts
await pipe(
  [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6],
  toAsync,
  map((a) => delay(100 * a, a)),
  concurrentPool(3),
  each(console.log), // log 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6
); // 0.9 seconds
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/concurrentPool.ts)
